cursor.ai.rules: NEVER add shebang lines (#!/usr/bin/env python3) to any files
Always use the configured package manager, never default to pip/python
Use uv for package management, not pip
Always activate .venv before running Python commands
Use google-style docstrings and type hints
Prefer PyTorch/numpy operations over Python loops
Validate tensor shapes and physics parameters
Use proper device placement for PyTorch tensors
